communityDescription: GDG is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.

description.short: An annual event hosted by the Google Developers Group across the world to bring the technology closer to the developers. It is an all day developer conference where we aim to focus on multiple technologies through lightning talks, sessions, workshops, etc.
description.long: Get ready for an exhilarating journey into the world of technology and innovation! GDG Baku is thrilled to present DevFest 2024, a one-of-a-kind gathering of tech enthusiasts, developers, and industry expertsüë®‚Äçüíª. With over 300 participants, 3 parallel sessions by 15 different speakers, DevFest Baku is the biggest developer event of Azerbaijan. This year's DevFest promises to be a celebration of cutting-edge technology, insightful discussions, and hands-on learning experiences. Join us as we explore the latest trends in web and mobile development, dive into the realms of artificial intelligence and machine learning, and master the intricacies of backend and frontend development. Participate in our interactive workshops featuring live coding sessions that will enhance your skills and broaden your horizons.üéâ

whatToExpect.title: Connect
whatToExpect.description: Meet local developers and technologists. All are welcome, including those with unique backgrounds and from various companies and industries.

whatToExpect.title: Learn
whatToExpect.description: Learn about a range of technical topics and gain new skills through hands-on workshops, training, events, talks, and meetups, online and in person.

whatToExpect.title: Grow
whatToExpect.description: Apply knowledge and connections to build great products and advance your skills, career, and network. Help your community learn too.

pastDevFest.summery: DevFest Baku 2023 was Azerbaijan's largest developer event, uniting 300+ tech enthusiasts for sessions on ML/AI, web and mobile development, and more. With 13 speakers, interactive workshops, and networking opportunities, it was a celebration of innovation and hands-on learning in technology.
